Twitter shouldn't hold the right to censor: http://www.guardian.co.uk/technology/2012/jan/27/twitter-users-threaten-boycott-censorship-accusation?CMP=twt_gu | Kabads - musings, mutterings and murmerings

Twitter shouldn't hold the right to censor: http://www.guardian.co.uk/technology/2012/jan/27/twitter-users-threaten-boycott-censorship-accusation?CMP=twt_gu

Apparently, twitter claims they will only use it when governments have a problem with a post. That's exactly what we don't want. 

Sign the petition here to let twitter know that they are doing the wrong thing here. 

http://act.demandprogress.org/sign/twitter_censorship/
